channel.title: Vestibule :: Suggestions for "Minimal Surface Area"
channel.description: A list of all suggestions made for "Minimal Surface Area"

item.title: Suggestion from John Pagonis (@)
item.description:
"How we can build small services into larger applications without overloading our brains" -. are you implying that with ruby we can do this?

If so, where is the basis of your thesis that "writing decoupled, smaller classes make code that fit's better into our heads" is indeed true? :-)

item.title: Suggestion from Bamboo (@b4mboo)
item.description: Sorry, auto-correct got a hold of me there. It was meant to say "that sort of questions".

item.title: Suggestion from Bamboo (@b4mboo)
item.description: More importantly, are you going to answer these questions by supplying strategies to achieve better results or is this talk aiming at discovery by asking that story of questions in the first place?

item.title: Suggestion from Nikos Dimitrakopoulos (@)
item.description: Even though I like the main idea of your proposal, it sounds rather generic. Can you give a few concrete examples of what this presentation is going to be about?
